description:
This is course will take you step by step with easy to follow and understand videos through many simple marketing strategies that will lead a high number of new customers to your business and increase your profits and cash in the bank. All these ideas work and have been used and tested by myself or one of my clients. They are all no-cost or low-cost ideas and can be implemented immediately.

This course is suited to small and medium businesses owners and managers who are looking to increase their local customers steadily. This course is not for you if you are looking for a quick instant fix.

Your mission when you have completed this course is to write out a simple bullet point marketing plan and take action and carry out each idea.

I want you to be satisfied with all aspects of this home study course and to be able t try some of the ideas straight away. That is why this is covered with my 100% guarantee so you have 30 days to try out this course.

I will continuously update this course and once you enrol you will get lifetime revisions and additions 100% free, no extra cost
title: Successfully Marketing a Local Business in 15 Easy Steps
